rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0001
rows.name:
So, you're trying to take
down Metsu, is that it?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0002
rows.name:
That's right. We can't let him repeat
the atrocity of sinking the Shiyan
Divine Beast here in Iira.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0003
rows.name:
You probably know this,
but he's strong.
He's a Heaven's Holy Grail, after all.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0004
rows.name:
But we have a Heaven's Holy Grail too.
Shouldn't that make us evenly matched?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0005
rows.name: Let's hope so.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, our goal is to protect Iira,
not just to beat Metsu.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0007
rows.name:
If we can talk him down,
that would be fine by me.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0008
rows.name:
Go ahead.
You've probably got a better chance
of that than beating him.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0009
rows.name: That's harsh.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0010
rows.name:
But this guy is Marveni's Blade,
just like Metsu.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0011
rows.name:
Which means he must know
more about him than we do.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0012
rows.name: So that's why you said that.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0013
rows.name: I'm not denying it.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0014
rows.name:
And if Marveni is the source,
the intel about him targeting
the Iiran capital is probably true.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0015
rows.name: So you still trust the guy, huh?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0016
rows.name:
He's the type to make 
good use of pawns like you.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0017
rows.name:
True. He can't factor you into his plans
if you're just wandering around aimlessly
with bad intel.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0018
rows.name: So, what's your plan now?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0019
rows.name:
I'm joining your little band.
I wouldn't have followed you otherwise.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0020
rows.name: Fair enough.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0021
rows.name:
If you're going to the capital,
I hope you're prepared
to cross the desert.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0022
rows.name: Prepared how?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0023
rows.name:
You were going to the capital without
even knowing? You'll get done
in by desert fever.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0024
rows.name: Desert fever?! What's that?!

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0025
rows.name:
It's a local fungal disease.
Harmless to Blades,
but deadly for humans.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0026
rows.name: I had no idea...

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0027
rows.name: I forgot...

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0028
rows.name:
Are you serious?
Were you planning to wipe yourselves
out before you even fight Metsu?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0029
rows.name: Hahaha...

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0030
rows.name:
Alright, let's get started
on the preparations.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0031
rows.name:
We'll need enough for me,
Adel, Hugo, Milt, and Satahiko.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0032
rows.name:
We'll have to go back a bit, but there's
a guy at the resistance camp, Montos,
who's an expert on medicine.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0033
rows.name:
We can gather the ingredients
and have him make enough antifungal
medicine for the five of us.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0034
rows.name: What ingredients do we need?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0035
rows.name: Melanicarrots and Nest Extract.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0036
rows.name:
You can probably find Melanicarrots
in the Iiran grasslands.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0037
rows.name:
Nest Extract should be obtainable from
Someille Nests and the like.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0038
rows.name: Got it! Let's hurry and gather them!
